评论详情: My great great nieces shirt she loves it .
Made well and I love it ! Arrived on time ! No complaints
Cute shirt,  well made. A little big imo, but fit well
Design was all ripped and gross on delivery
True to size, good quality. Would  definitely buy again

this was an amazing find. My 7 year old daughter is deaf. She wears cochlear implants so she can hear, but she very much identifies as deaf. She can’t hear without technology. I found this and couldn’t believe it.  She wore it proudly to school on Valentine’s Day. I gave it to her Valentines morning as a surprise, and she was thrilled!
Cute toddler t-shirt. Nice material and heart print. I ordered a size larger than normal but the shirt ran pretty small. Still usable..looks cute but not the fit I was hoping for.
The shirt is as presented but once it was washed and dryed the heart plastic was stuck together I had to pull it apart and it messed up the design
Adorable shirt! My daughter loved it. Fit true to size on her.
Good quality t shirt and print! Exactly as described. Good soft material. None of that spandex stuff! Definitely recommend buying if you are unsure.
Soft, comfortable shirt. Fits my daughter well (size 6 shirt, she weighs ~60 pounds). We've washed it twice and it washes well, air drying. Very happy with this purchase!
